65.author: by Pat S

notes: Also titled "Chapter Six: Testament of Wonder," these pages are made up of brief recollections by Schwartz, Paul Levitz, Gil Kane, Mark Evanier, Jerry Bails, Carmine Infantino, Murphy Anderson, Forry Ackerman, and Pat S. Calhoun, with photos of Schwartz, Jean Ordwein, John Broome, Gil Kane, Joe Kubert, Forrest Ackerman, Murphy Anderson, Irwin Hasen, Sheldon Moldoff, Curt Swan, Kurt Schaffenberger, and Pat Calhoun.
